docs.title: Getting started
docs.body: Supports Python 2.7 and Python 3.4+.  Installed with pip <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip>: $ python -m pip install elastic_workplace_search You can also download and install the project source: $ python setup.py install Depends on requests for making HTTP requests.

docs.title: Creating a new Client
docs.body: Creating a new Client from elastic_workplace_search import Client authorization_token = 'authorization token' client = Client(authorization_token) Retrieve your access token and a content source key after creating your content source.
